Key Match Events: Mohamed Kudus scored a brace for Ghana.
Omar Marmoush and Mostafa Mohamed scored for Egypt.
Mohamed Salah limped off with an apparent hamstring injury just before the break.
Inaki Williams' pass enabled Omar Marmoush to score in the 69th minute.
Mostafa Mohamed scored from Trezeguet’s cutback to level the match for Egypt.
Iddrisu Baba missed a crucial header in stoppage time.
Post-Match Reflections: Jurgen Klopp and Rui Vitoria will be hoping Mohamed Salah's injury is not serious as Egypt needs their talisman for the last group game, and Liverpool cannot afford to lose their star player for a prolonged period.
